Dialogs.Text: LostDecipher2: Just to know, who were the first ones here?
ChronoWriter1885: I think our group was the first here in the reopening of this server.
LostDecipher2: I mean in this room, when you discovered the chat.
ChronoWriter1885: Oh, right, we discovered this room when we first discovered the server.
ChronoWriter1885: It was me, Pixy, Jack and... I think Dolly was here too.
MsMaki95: He is talking about AuDol65, our music expert. You didn't met her yet.
ChronoWriter1885: Dolly was the one who saw it first and told me to call Pixy so she can come.
ChronoWriter1885: She then came with Jack, who was kind of worried in the state the mural image was in. And so he told us to not touch it.
ChronoWriter1885: After that, we left this area mostly in charge of Pixy. Besides her, and us when we first came, nobody else who came here seemed to mess around with the things here.
ChronoWriter1885: Besides the drawing tools in Pixy's room of course.
LostDecipher2: So, some people passed thorugh here, but nodody else than her and the first ones who came touched things beyond Maki's room.
ChronoWriter1885: Pretty much. Heh, you seem quite the curious guy, are you not part of the group?
LostDecipher2: I swear i'm here by my lonesome.
Thomas B: Still, something is picking my curiosity. I think i need to analyze his words with more detail because something feels amiss... (Portraits pending)
